question: [File: aptos-core/ecosystem/indexer-grpc/indexer-grpc-data-service-v2/src/connection_manager.rs] [Function: start()] [Multiple Start Calls] Can start() be called multiple times concurrently, creating multiple infinite loops that all send heartbeats simultaneously, potentially overwhelming GrpcManager with duplicate requests?
